EmailTemplate.subject: IMPORTANT PLEASE READ: New Required Opportunity Fields
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Just a friendly reminder that with today's release there are new rules regarding required Opportunity fields that are set to take effect Tomorrow, March 21st, 2018
There is a new section on the Opportunity named "Sales Details"
This section contains a series of now required fields (at sales stages Selling and beyond) detailing inventory use case and projected move out details:
Primary Use Case (Required): High level use case of what the WeWork space utilized for (i.e. HQ, Swing space, Satellite Office, etc.)
Use Case Additional Notes (Optional): Additional details relating to the use case of WeWork space
Is member planning to move out? (Required): Likelihood of predetermined move out
Forecasted move out date (Required): Earliest prospective move out date (required only when the "Is member planning to move out?" field is set to "Yes-100%" or "Likely-75%")
Reason for predetermined move out (Optional): Additional details relating to why the member is predetermined to move out
Please note: The field requirements will not apply to already existing Opportunities. Only Opportunities created on March 21st 2018 and beyond will be subject to these rules.
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact us at salesforcesupport@wework.com
